mapper.select: select e.estmt_code, c.client_name "client_code", e.estmt_date, e.de_date, TO_CHAR(e.all_sum,'999,999') || '원' "fall_sum",e.estmt_st from estimate e, client c where e.client_code = c.client_code order by estmt_code

select d.estmt_dno, d.pro_code, p.pro_name, d.sell_num, TO_CHAR(o.sell_price,'999,999') || '원' "fsell_price", TO_CHAR( (d.sell_num * o.sell_price),'999,999,999') || '원' fsum_price from estimate e, estimate_D d, product p, product_option o where e.estmt_code = d.estmt_code and d.pro_code = p.pro_code and p.pro_code = o.pro_code and e.estmt_code = #{estmtCode} order by estmt_dno
select p.pro_code, p.pro_name, o.sell_price from product p, product_option o where p.pro_code =o.pro_code
select concat('est' , concat (to_char(sysdate,'YYmmdd'), concat ('-', nvl(max(to_number(substr(estmt_code, 11))),0)+1 ) )) "estmtCode" from estimate
mapper.insert: insert into estimate (estmt_code, client_code, estmt_date, de_date, estmt_st) values( #{estmtCode}, #{clientCode} , sysdate, sysdate, '대기')

select nvl(max(to_number(estmt_dno),0))+1 from estimate_d
insert into estimate_d (estmt_dno, estmt_code, pro_code, sell_num ) values ( #{estmtDno}, #{estmtCode}, #{proCode}, #{sellNum} )
mapper.update: update estimate set estmt_st = '승인' where estmt_code = #{estmtCode}
